item.title: Issue with my updater(Solved Please Lock)
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:12, topic:186050”][quote author=lawl link=topic=248441.msg2089467#msg2089467 date=1204713520]

Perhaps his reference to the word updater is different than yours…
[/quote]definition or understanding, not reference

trying to sound smart doesnt work when it makes 0 sense

In that case, connotation. We understand words our way, not the general/intended way, thus making everyone use words differently.

Especially when you failed to quote me properly.[/quote]who gives a fuck if he failed to quote properly, anyone with half a brain can figure out what he said

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with my updater(Solved Please Lock)
item.dc:creator: @speedster239 speedster239
item.description:
@speedster239 wrote:

[quote=“blitz_9100, post:1, topic:186050”]ive been working on a updater and i got it almost done but i keep running in this error when i try to make the url go into the argument part it heres my startup method

    public static void main(String args[])
    {
		Urlz = args[0];
        (new Updater()).start();
    }

i get this error

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0
        at Updater.main(Unknown Source)

can someone help me fix this?[/quote]

I highly doubt you wrote your own updater if you couldn’t figure out how to actually start it.

Read full topic
